name: Demon Stalkers: The Raid on Doomfane
name_original: Demon Stalkers: The Raid on Doomfane
description:
Demon Stalkers: The Raid on Doomfane is an arcade game developed by Micro Forte. It was originally released in 1988. Micro Forte published the game.
Demon Stalkers: The Raid on Doomfane is available on PC.
